entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is described as dragging Harry away from the dais. He is introduced as a character who is eager to reenter the battle.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as being dragged away by Lupin and still staring at the archway, indicating that he was previously waiting for someone (Sirius).

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as keeping Harry waiting, implying that Sirius was supposed to meet with Harry but did not show up on time.
